docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -xe     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends         ca-certificates curl dirmngr gnupg     && mkdir /platform     && mkdir -p "$RAPIDOID_TMP" 	&& curl -SL "$RAPIDOID_URL" -o $RAPIDOID_JAR 	&& curl -SL "$RAPIDOID_URL.asc" -o $RAPIDOID_JAR.asc 	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" 	&& gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys $GPG_KEY 	&& gpg --batch --verify $RAPIDOID_JAR.asc $RAPIDOID_JAR 	&& rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" 	&& rm "$RAPIDOID_JAR.asc" 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
docker.raw: RUN set -xe     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends         ca-certificates curl dirmngr gnupg     && mkdir /platform     && mkdir -p "$RAPIDOID_TMP" 	&& curl -SL "$RAPIDOID_URL" -o $RAPIDOID_JAR 	&& curl -SL "$RAPIDOID_URL.asc" -o $RAPIDOID_JAR.asc 	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" 	&& gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys $GPG_KEY 	&& gpg --batch --verify $RAPIDOID_JAR.asc $RAPIDOID_JAR 	&& rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" 	&& rm "$RAPIDOID_JAR.asc" 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
